title: in-game freezing/crashing
body: So over the past few weeks, I will play a game, and randomly my computer screen will freeze. This doesnt happen every game but when it does it usually results in a loss. I can hear the sound of the game looping over and over and i can move my cursor but the only way i've been able to get back into the game is by hitting Alt+tab a few times, Ctrl+alt+delete, or in the worst case, i have to reboot my computer by holding down the power button. I play with a friend and he says that while my screen is frozen, if i click anywhere on the screen my character will still move and if i try to recall it will actually work. this has been going on for about the last month and its very frustrating.

replies.body: Same for me here! I tried all of the above but since patch 7.23 my game crashes every now and then and i have to restart my pc :(

Every time I play one game after a game update, it freezes, forcing me to restart my computer. It repeats the last sound that was heard over and over. These games say that I was connected also which made it so I don't back, causing a free kill with my afk. Since then I have stop playing ranked due to losing lp and going down in elo and am just playing norms. Although I still am freezing up. Please help me fix this soon.

It sounds like your game is crashing, which can happen for a few reasons like outdated drivers or a bad game file.   Also, if you are on Windows 10, the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) auto enabled for some players which is causing freezing like this.  Try disabling that as your first step!  Otherwise, go over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help rule out possibilities.  Let me know if you run into any issues.
i have the same problem and i tried to auto enable the xbox game bar but it didnt work and then i checked over the game crash section and nothing could somewone help me
I found the solution, do a full repair, log in, deactivate low spec mode, log out, then log in again, fixed.{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

I can't even move cursor or alt+tab, i have to reboot by holding down power button, and that isn't good for my PC health either. All other games run on Ultra, even "DOTO" works better, happens in ~90% of my LoL games {{item:3070}}
